ANU.name: Stephen Wilks
ANU.colleges: College of Arts and Social Sciences
expertise: Australian History Excl. Aboriginal And Torres Strait Islander History
interest: Biography, especially political biography; ideas about Australian national development
project: Stephen has recently published with ANU Press a book on Earle Page and his ideas about national development, dealing with many important strands in Australian history including federalism, decentralisation, regionalism, economic planning, electrification and higher education. He is also co-ordinating the Dictionary of the House of Representatives project, focussed on Speakers, Deputy Speakers and Clerks of the House. He is a co-editor of the Australian Journal of Biography and History.
